Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Jose.src.characters.Character

extends Character
    Player specialization of the Character class.

    Dzejrou

      Reference to the game's input context.

      Added every jump frame to the jump distance until it passes the maximum jump height.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void apply_movement(float mov_x, float mov_y)
      Checks if the given movement is possible and if so, applies it to the player.
      private boolean can_climb()
      Returns true if the player can climb a ladder at the player's current position, false otherwise.
      private void change_direction()
      Checks if the direction of the player should change and changes it if needed with the appropriate animation and state.
      void die()
      Kills the character.
      private void draw_debug_info(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
      Draws all necessary debug info to the screen along with the black background box and solid tile bounding boxes.
      void draw(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
      Method that is used to draw the player's current animation and all other necessary sprites and/or text.
      private void fall()
      Makes the player fall by changing his state and vertical speed.
      private float get_direction_modifier()
      Movement to the right means increasing the X axis, movement to the left means decreasing the X axis and similarly for the Y axis changes, this method calculated the sign of the position difference variable for the update_movement method.
      int get_score()
      Returns the player's current score.
      float get_x()
      Returns the player's X axis coordinate.
      float get_y()
      Returns the player's Y axis coordinate.
      private void handle_debug_input()
      Handles special input while in debug mode, like movement, teleportation and the debug state toggling.
      boolean is_dead()
      Returns true if the player is dead, false otherwise.
      private void jump()
      Makes the player jump by changing his state and vertical speed.
      private void land()
      Makes the player land by changing his state, also used to stop movement.
      boolean looks_at(float pos_x)
      Returns true if the player looks at a given point in the map, returns false otherwisei (horizontal check only).
      void set_score(int val)
      Sets the player's current score.
      private void update_coins()
      Checks if the player has collected a coin and if so, destroys it and adds it's value to the player's score.
      private void update_movement(long delta)
      Updates the player's position depending on his state and collision detection.
      private void update_state(long delta)
      Updates the player's state based on his input.
      void update(long delta)
      Main update method, calls state, movement and animation updates and moves the game's view if necessary.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(org.newdawn.slick.tiled.TiledMap m,
              float pos_x,
              float pos_y,
              org.newdawn.slick.Input i,
              View v,
              java.util.List<Coin> c,
              java.util.List<Platform> p)
        Constructor, sets all necessary attributes of the player and creates animations.
        Parameters:
        m - Reference to the level's map.
        pos_x - X axis coordinate of the spawn point.
        pos_y - Y axis coordinate of the spawn point.
        i - Reference to the game's input context.
        v - Reference to the game's view.
        c - List holding the coins in the map.

        Updates the player's position depending on his state and collision detection.
        Parameters:
        delta - Time difference since the last update call.

      • get_direction_modifier

        private float get_direction_modifier()
        Movement to the right means increasing the X axis, movement to the left means decreasing the X axis and similarly for the Y axis changes, this method calculated the sign of the position difference variable for the update_movement method.

        mov_y - Y axis position difference.
